configuration:
dfs.namenode.name.dir file:///home/hadoop/ha-cluster/data/namenode
dfs.replication {{ hdfs__replication }}
dfs.permissions false
dfs.nameservices ha-cluster
dfs.ha.namenodes.ha-cluster {{ hadoop_namenodes | join(',') }}
{% for host in hadoop_namenodes -%}
dfs.namenode.rpc-address.ha-cluster.{{ host }} {{ host }}{%- if hdfs_host_domain_name is defined and hdfs_host_domain_name | length > 0 -%}.{{ hdfs_host_domain_name }}{%- endif -%}:8020
dfs.namenode.rpc-bind-host.{{ hdfs_nameservices }}.{{ host }} 0.0.0.0
{% endfor -%} {% for host in hdfs_namenodes -%}
dfs.namenode.http-address.{{ hdfs_nameservices }}.{{ host }} {{ host }}{%- if hdfs_host_domain_name is defined and hdfs_host_domain_name | length > 0 -%}.{{ hdfs_host_domain_name }}{%- endif -%}:50070
{% endfor -%}
dfs.namenode.shared.edits.dir qjournal://{{ hdfs_journalnodes | join(':8485' + ';') }}:8485/ha-cluster

dfs.ha.automatic-failover.enabled true
dfs.ha.fencing.methods
sshfence shell
dfs.ha.fencing.ssh.private-key-files /home/hadoop/.ssh/id_rsa
dfs.datanode.data.dir /home/hadoop/ha-cluster/data/datanode
